title: 67 - Women In Leadership - Guest Karrie Garcia of Freedom Movement
description:
This week Karrie Garcia, founder of Freedom Movement, joins us for an incredible conversation.  She shares about her journey through drug addiction, being a "perfect" Christian, and what it required for her to decide not to take her own life.  You don't want to miss this episode!

www.thefreedommovement.us
Follow Karrie on Instagram: www.instagram.com/karriegarcia1  

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - http://apple.co/1Lla1Nj
Music provided by Izzi Ray - http://www.soundcloud.com/izziray

Mike Erre participates as VOX Team Leader at VOX Community, a church expression of the VOX Podcast.  Learn more about VOX Community at www.voxoc.com.

Listen to our Sunday teaching from VOX Community:
